questions.quote: Don't you see what Whatley is after? Total joke telling immunity. He's already got the two big religions covered, if he ever gets Polish citizenship there'll be no stopping him.
Because, he doesn't pay any attention to me, and uh he ignores me.
Tell Jerry I'm sorry, I'm going to have to write him some new checks.
Yes he can. He controls the means of production. What are you going to do Jerry?
He said that?  What a nerve. How dare he say something like that.
Yeah,yeah!! I'll pick you up right now.....All right All right....Hey! gotta go.
What else did you tell  him.  The two of you must have had *quite* a little chat!
No, Gordon Lightfoot was the singer. Edmund Fitzgerald was the ship.
Well, I think you'll find out soon enough.  Aren't you going to get that?
Of course, I stink, you stink. It's show bizz. everybody stinks..
